jobDescription: DATA SCIENTIST – Remote OK! ALTA IT Services has an immediate ,direct hire opening for a Data Scientist to support a respected data analytics organization based in McLean, VA. This position may be worked 100% remotely. This position requires US Citizenship, a current or former Client Client CBP clearance is very highly desired. The selected candidate must pass a pre-employment security investigation which will take several weeks to adjudicate.  The Data Scientist will be responsible for text mining, developing predictive systems, risk scoring, creating efficient algorithms and improving data quality. This individual will work closely with the corporate analysts to identify, evaluate, design and implement statistical analyses of gathered open source, proprietary, and customer data to create analytic metrics and tools to support analysts as well as the platform. This individual will have the opportunity to contribute directly to the features and capabilities deployed in our applications. The ideal candidate will work with customers to assist in gathering requirements and contributing to Statements of Work (SOWs) for new sales or POCs and executing design post sale while getting deeply involved into the delivery of the proposed solutions. The role will interface with the customer and provide continuity of technical and data-exploration expertise to ensure we are delivering a workable solution that meets the customer requirements and technical capabilities. The position requires a mission oriented person who strives to produce the best possible work for the customer.
